description: Lists scan results aggregated by checks.

parameters.name: filterCriteria
parameters.description: The filter criteria. accountIdFilters (list) --- The criteria's account ID filters. (dict) --- The CIS string filter. The comparison value of the CIS string filter. The value of the CIS string filter. checkIdFilters (list) --- The criteria's check ID filters. failedResourcesFilters (list) --- The criteria's failed resources filters. (dict) --- The CIS number filter. lowerInclusive (integer) --- The CIS number filter's lower inclusive. upperInclusive (integer) --- The CIS number filter's upper inclusive. platformFilters (list) --- The criteria's platform filters. securityLevelFilters (list) --- The criteria's security level filters. (dict) --- The CIS security level filter. Security level refers to the Benchmark levels that CIS assigns to a profile. The CIS security filter comparison value. The CIS security filter value. titleFilters (list) --- The criteria's title filters. The value of the CIS string filter.

nested_params.description: The comparison value of the CIS string filter.

nested_params.description: The value of the CIS string filter.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The account ID for the CIS check.

nested_items.name: checkDescription
nested_items.description: The description for the CIS check.

nested_items.name: checkId
nested_items.description: The check ID for the CIS check.

nested_items.name: scanArn
nested_items.description: The scan ARN for the CIS check scan ARN.

nested_items.name: failed
nested_items.description: The number of checks that failed.

nested_items.name: passed
nested_items.description: The number of checks that passed.

nested_items.name: skipped
nested_items.description: The number of checks that were skipped.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token from a previous request that's used to retrieve the next page of results.
